title: Construction of the Main Building (Phase - I) at the Base Hospital in Beruwala
decision_details:
- The proposal made by Hon.(Dr.) Rajitha Senaratne, the Minister of Health, Nutrition & Indigenous Medicine, to award the contract for the construction of  
the Pile Foundation of the nine storey main building (Phase - I) at the Base Hospital in Beruwala to M/s Access Engineering PLC for a sum of Rs.355 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
